attributes.action: Close Prescoed open prison nr Usk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Several prisoners have absconded from the Prescoed open prison since last summer, including child rapists and a murderer.
This prison is putting the local population of Usk at risk from these prisoners. 
It is time this prison was closed.
Sign the petition if you are in agreement.
